nisola_martins: I'm still struggling with the notion that there's still safety in the world.I come into my home, I see favoritism . I go outside my home and I see tribalism staring me hard in the face and I leave my country and racism awaits me. I'm also trying to look at it from the white's angle, is it truly the hate we give or show to them that would warrant them to actually have a negative perception of us leading to how they mistreat us. Truth is, there's no excuse to how we've been considered and treated lower than them. They kill us all the time without justice, they harm us by introducing harmful substances and we always fall for their trap, we buy these things,get addicted to them causing us to misbehave in the society and at the end is jail. All these proving the point they created. Our voice, our opinion, our will is the strongest we have now. There's so much talking and fruitless protest. When do we truly gain our freedom because even in liberty, we are still wrapped up in the chains of slavery.
